content: @Sebastien Gouezel You shouldn't remove "TO CONTRIBUTORS" from PR description because bors deletes text starting with these words from the commit message.
Oh, so this PR template now has some use!
It was possible to use PR description for commit messages before by creating a section named "Commit Message" but this was rarely used, and was not in the template.
I didn't know about this possibility till a few days before we moved to bors.
